metadata.name: Corridor of Broken Dreams
metadata.description:
Forget about the world outside, and keep walking forward. You hear the sound of rain against the glass walls, but it feels very distant. Almost like it came from another world, that is no longer any of your concern.

As you reach the end, you find a coffin made out of glass. Inside the coffin is a figure dressed in white. You can't see the figure's face, but you know that it is your own.

It's time.
